name: lastfm
description: Retrieve data from your Last.fm listening history

options.name: current
options.description: Display a user's now playing or most recent track

options.name: user
options.description: The user to retrieve the track for, default you

options.name: albums
options.description: Get the most listened albums by a user over a given period

options.name: period
options.description: The period for the most listened albums, default last 7 days

options.name: user
options.description: The user to get the most listened albums for, default you

options.name: artists
options.description: Get the most listened artists by a user over a given period

options.name: period
options.description: The period for the most listened artists, default last 7 days

options.name: user
options.description: The user to get the most listened artists for, default you

options.name: tracks
options.description: Get the most listened tracks by a user over a given period

options.name: period
options.description: The period for the most listened tracks, default last 7 days

options.name: user
options.description: The user to get the most listened tracks for, default you

options.name: collage
options.description: Display a collage based on a user's Last.fm listening habits.

options.name: period
options.description: The period of the collage for, default last 7 days

options.name: size
options.description: The size (number of rows and columns) of the collage for, default 3 by 3

options.name: user
options.description: The user to generate a collage for, default you

options.name: set
options.description: Register your Last.fm username for use with other Last.fm commands

options.name: username
options.description: The username of your Last.fm account

options.name: clear
options.description: Clears your registered Last.fm username from TaylorBot
